facts.value: ~/.claude/clauded-cli/cli.js uses HTTP module to fetch models from http://127.0.0.1:3000/v1/models at startup
Use --model flag instead of modifying /model picker. Wrapper at ~/Desktop/Projects/komplete-kontrol-cli/clauded-wrapper.sh. Install: sudo cp clauded-wrapper.sh /usr/local/bin/clauded

patterns.trigger: clauded model picker not showing all models
patterns.solution: Check if execSync+curl is timing out. Replace with Node http.get() using busy-wait pattern. Verify with: ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3000 node -e 'require(~/.claude/clauded-cli/cli.js)'
